title: Part a.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for calculating the opportunity cost:

1L = (60/40) = 1.5H
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for calculating the opportunity cost:

1L = (60/40) = 1.5H

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for calculating the opportunity cost:

1L = (60/40) = 1.5H

title: Part b.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that Country A has a comparative advantage in producing looms because it has a lower opportunity cost than Country B.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that Country A has a comparative advantage in producing looms because it has a lower opportunity cost than Country B.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that Country A has a comparative advantage in producing looms because it has a lower opportunity cost than Country B.

title: Part c.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that both countries will benefit from trade.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that both countries will benefit from trade.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that both countries will benefit from trade.

title: Part d.
stimulusHtml:
2 points

  • One point is earned for stating no.

  • One point is earned for stating yes.
